page.title: 12School Day 1.00pm.-3.15pm.
page.content: At 1.00pm. the bell goes for the start of the afternoon. First the register is called, and then we go to Assembly with the exception of Mondays. On Tuesday the Headteacher tells us about things happening during the week and grumbles at us for things we have done wrong. Wednesday is hymn practice and Thursday and Friday is teacher and class Assemblies. After Assembly I some times continue with my project work, doing practical investigations. Some afternoons we sing and play musical instruments and we often have games such as stoolball, rounders, and kickball. I choose to do art work in the afternoon rather than in the morning. This year I have done collages, lino-printing, painting etc. We usually finish with a story before going home at 3.15pm.
